name: Swock
description:
A game made for the GeoJam 2021. The theme is Switch. This game is made in 1 week and is made by Rick and Tigo. We had a lot of fun making Swock and i hope you like it as well.

Swock is a combination of switch and block, because in this game you have to switch your position with a block to reach the end. Can you complete all levels?

Swock is free to play.

Controls

Walk with A and D
Jump with W
Swap with Space
Select with Left mouse button

Shapes

Yellow circle is Player
Red triangle is Trap
Green square is Swappable block
Dark blue square is Swappable gravity block
Orange rectangle is Door
Light blue hexagon is Key to open door
Pink hexagon is Triggered key to open door
